{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/readme","text":"[img height=200 [https://nos.netease.com/ydschool-online/newOriental_SAT_3.jpg]] 此学习包共有 4464 个来源于新东方.SAT词汇词根+联想记忆法的单词。有道团队精心打造，一本优秀的好书送给优秀的你。 可在 [[墨屉手册|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/zh-Hans#鱼罐头子插件]] 查看安装使用教程。"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3]plugintiddlers[]tag[?]]":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3]plugintiddlers[]tag[?]]","type":"application/json","caption":"新东方SAT词汇"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word","tags":"$:/tags/QuestionTemplate","code-body":"yes","text":" {{!!word}}<$reveal default={{!!picture}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >

"},"$:/SAT_3/misdeed_1":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/misdeed_1","tags":"?","word":"misdeed","created":"20220616115621603","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"mis'did","usphone":",mɪs'did","remMethod":" mis (坏) + deed (行为) → 坏行为 → 罪行， 犯罪","sentences":"...the alleged financial misdeeds of his government.
^^...他的政府被指控在财政方面行为不当。^^
","synos":"n.
罪行；犯罪：crime, guilt
"},"$:/SAT_3/recline_2":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/recline_2","tags":"?","word":"recline","created":"20220616115621603","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"ri'klain","usphone":"rɪ'klaɪn","remMethod":" re (回) + cline (弯曲) → 斜回去 → 斜靠","sentences":"She proceeded to recline on a chaise longue.
^^她开始斜靠在一个躺椅上。^^
","relWords":"adj.
reclining: 倾斜的

n.
recliner: 斜靠著的人；躺著的人；活动躺椅（等于reclining chair）
reclining: 倾斜

v.
reclining: 斜倚；依赖（recline的ing形式）

","synos":"vi.
靠；依赖；斜倚：build on, depend upon
vt.
使躺下；使斜倚：couch
"},"$:/SAT_3/belligerent_3":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/belligerent_3","tags":"?","word":"belligerent","created":"20220616115621603","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"bə'lidʒərənt","usphone":"bi'lidʒərənt","remMethod":"bell (战争) + i + ger (发动) + ent (…的) → 喜欢发动战争的 → 好战的","sentences":"a belligerent attitude
^^敌对的态度^^
","relWords":"adj.
bellicose: 好战的；好斗的

adv.
belligerently: 好战地；好斗地

n.
belligerence: 斗争性；好战性；交战
bellicosity: 好斗；好战
belligerency: 交战状态；交战

","synos":"adj.
交战的；好战的；交战国的：fighting, warring
"},"$:/SAT_3/supplant_4":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/supplant_4","tags":"?","word":"supplant","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"sə'plɑːnt","usphone":"sə'plænt","remMethod":" sup (下面) + plant (种植) → 在下面种植 → 取代","sentences":"Barker was soon supplanted as party leader.
^^巴克在党内的领导地位很快就被人取代了。^^
","relWords":"n.
supplanter: 排挤者，取代者；代替者

","synos":"vt.
代替；排挤掉：replace, substitute for
"},"$:/SAT_3/abrupt_5":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/abrupt_5","tags":"?","word":"abrupt","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"ə'brʌpt","usphone":"ə'brʌpt","remMethod":" ab (去掉) + rupt (断) → 突然断掉了 → 突然的， 意外的","phrases":"abrupt change: 突变；陡变
abrupt slope: 陡坡
","sentences":"an abrupt change of plan
^^计划的突然改变^^
","relWords":"adv.
abruptly: 突然地；唐突地

n.
abruptness: 突然；唐突；粗鲁无理；急缓度

","synos":"adj.
生硬的；突然的；唐突的；陡峭的：sudden, short, angular
"},"$:/SAT_3/oversee_6":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/oversee_6","tags":"?","word":"oversee","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"ˌəuvə'siː","usphone":"'ovɚ'si","remMethod":" over (在…之上) + see (看) → 高高在上地看 → 视察","sentences":"Use a surveyor or architect to oversee and inspect the different stages of the work.
^^用一名监察员或建筑师去监督和检查工程的不同阶段。^^
","relWords":"n.
overseer: 监督；工头

","synos":"vt.
监督；审查；俯瞰；偷看到，无意中看到：police, survey
"},"$:/SAT_3/spontaneous_7":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/spontaneous_7","tags":"?","word":"spontaneous","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"spɔn'teiniəs","usphone":"spɑn'tenɪəs","remMethod":" spont (自然) + aneous → 自然的， 自发的","phrases":"spontaneous combustion: 自燃
spontaneous emission: [电磁学]自发发射
spontaneous abortion: 自然流产；自发性流产
amplified spontaneous emission: 放大自发射；放大式自发射
spontaneous ignition: 自燃
spontaneous polarization: 自发极化；自然极化
spontaneous recovery: 自然回复（恢复）；自然痊愈
spontaneous radiation: 自发辐射
spontaneous magnetization: 自发磁化；自发磁化强度
","sentences":"The crowd gave a spontaneous cheer.
^^人群自发地欢呼起来。^^
My spontaneous reaction was to run away.
^^我的本能反应就是逃跑。^^
","relWords":"adv.
spontaneously: 自发地；自然地；不由自主地

n.
spontaneity: 自发性；自然发生
spontaneousness: 自然；任意

","synos":"adj.
自发的；自然的；无意识的：autonomous, mechanical, natural, initiative
"},"$:/SAT_3/pretend_8":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/pretend_8","tags":"?","word":"pretend","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"pri'tend","usphone":"prɪ'tɛnd","remMethod":" pre (预先) + tend (趋向) → 事先就有趋向 → 假装","sentences":"Let’s pretend we’re on the moon.
^^我们假装自己是在月球上吧。^^
He’s not asleep – he’s just pretending.
^^他并没睡着，不过是装睡而已。^^
To pretend ignorance of the situation would be irresponsible.
^^装作不知情是不负责任的做法。^^
I can’t marry her and to pretend otherwise would be wrong.
^^我不可以娶她，装作娶她无妨是不对的。^^
","relWords":"adj.
pretended: 假装的；虚假的

n.
pretense: 借口；虚假；炫耀；自吹（等于pretence）
pretence: 假装；借口；虚伪
pretender: 冒牌者；妄求者；妄提要求者

v.
pretended: 假装（pretend的过去式和过去分词）；装扮

","synos":"vt.
假装；假扮；伪称：simulate, come
vi.
假装；伪称：act, fox
adj.
假装的：affected, assumed, simulate
"},"$:/SAT_3/licit_9":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/licit_9","tags":"?","word":"licit","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'lisit","usphone":"'lɪsɪt","sentences":"She made some money by licit means.
^^他用正当的手段挣了一些钱。^^
Losses would then be a licit investment in future profits.
^^这样一来，损失就可视作为博取将来利润而进行的合法投资。^^
","synos":"adj.
正当的，合法的：valid, legal, legitimate, lawful
"},"$:/SAT_3/gloomy_10":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/gloomy_10","tags":"?","word":"gloomy","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'gluːmi","usphone":"'ɡlumi","sentences":"The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
^^这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。^^
","relWords":"adv.
gloomily: 沮丧地；黑暗地；阴沈地

n.
gloom: 忧郁；阴暗
gloominess: 黑暗；沮丧
glooming: 怒容；皱眉

v.
glooming: 变黑暗；变郁闷（gloom的ing形式）

vi.
gloom: 变阴暗；变忧沉；感到沮丧

vt.
gloom: 使黑暗；使忧郁

","synos":"adj.
黑暗的；沮丧的；阴郁的：dark, sad, blue, gray, disappointed
"},"$:/SAT_3/warrant_11":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/warrant_11","tags":"?","word":"warrant","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'wɔrənt","usphone":"'wɔrənt","remMethod":" warr (看作war， 战争) + ant (蚂蚁) → 战争中一旦得到授权令开战后就是杀人如蚁 → 许可证， 委任状","phrases":"arrest warrant: 逮捕证
search warrant: ［法］搜查证
","sentences":"Therefore, it is important to note that individual situations may warrant including additional characters in the list of special characters.
^^因此，要注意可能保证把额外字符包括到特殊字符列表中的个别情况，这一点很重要。^^
Learning incessantly is the surest way to keep pace with the times in the information age and an infallible warrant of success in times of uncertainty.
^^持续的学习是在资讯时代中跟时代并驾齐驱的最稳当的方法，也是在变动的世代中成功的可靠保证。^^
At Dean Miller's suggestion, I have allowed her to give the current student organizers the opportunity to propose a program for next semester that might warrant continuation of this event on campus.
^^根据米勒学监的建议，我允许她给学生机会，让他们给下学期的活动提出一个方案，保证这个活动得以在校园内继续开展。^^
","relWords":"adj.
warranted: 保证的；担保的

n.
warranty: 保证；担保；授权；（正当）理由
warrantee: 被保证人；被担保人
warranter: 担保人
warrantor: 保证人；担保人

v.
warranted: 批准（warrant的过去分词）；授权

","synos":"n.
根据；证明；正当理由；委任状：authentication, certification, demonstration, foundation, proof
vt.
保证；担保；批准；辩解：assure, undertake, confirm
"},"$:/SAT_3/scanty_12":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/scanty_12","tags":"?","word":"scanty","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'skænti","usphone":"'skænti","sentences":"There is only scanty evidence of his involvement.
^^显示他牵涉其中的证据不足。^^
","relWords":"adj.
scant: 不足的；缺乏的；勉强够的

adv.
scantily: 缺乏地；吝啬地；不充足地

n.
scantiness: 缺乏；不足

vt.
scant: 减少；节省；限制

","synos":"adj.
缺乏的；吝啬的；仅有的；稀疏的：tight, lacking, scarce
"},"$:/SAT_3/energy_13":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/energy_13","tags":"?","word":"energy","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'enədʒi","usphone":"'ɛnɚdʒi","phrases":"energy consumption: [化]能量损耗
energy saving: 节能，能源节省
energy conservation: 能量守恒；能源节约
solar energy: 太阳能
new energy: 新能源
high energy: 高能量；高能率
energy efficiency: 能源效率；能量效率
low energy: 低能的；低能量
save energy: 节约能源
renewable energy: 再生能源；可更新能源
electric energy: 电能
potential energy: 势能
energy dissipation: 能量耗散
energy source: 安瑞索思（公司名称）
clean energy: 清洁能源
energy storage: 蓄能；能量储存；储能器
kinetic energy: [物]动能
heat energy: 热能
energy industry: 能源产业，能源工业
activation energy: [物化]活化能
","sentences":"The water is heated using energy from the sun.
^^水是利用太阳能加热的。^^
The problem with nuclear energy is dealing with the waste.
^^核能的问题就是要处理核废料。^^
","relWords":"adj.
energetic: 精力充沛的；积极的；有力的
enervate: 衰弱的；无力的

adv.
energetically: 积极地；精力充沛地

vi.
energize: 活动；用力

vt.
energize: 激励；使活跃；供给…能量
enervate: 使衰弱；使失去活力
energise: 供给…能量；使精力充沛（等于energize）

","synos":"n.
[物]能量；精力；[劳经]活力；精神：vitality, spirit, soul, mind, spring
"},"$:/SAT_3/deference_14":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/deference_14","tags":"?","word":"deference","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'defərəns","usphone":"'dɛfərəns","remMethod":"来自defer (v. 听从， 顺从)","phrases":"in deference to: 鉴于；听从
","sentences":"...the older political tradition of deference to great leaders.
^^…敬重伟大领导人的较老的政治传统。^^
","relWords":"adj.
deferential: 恭敬的；惯于顺从的

vi.
defer: 推迟；延期；服从

vt.
defer: 使推迟；使延期

","synos":"n.
顺从：compliance, Friend VS Lover
"},"$:/SAT_3/solid_15":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/solid_15","tags":"?","word":"solid","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'sɔlid","usphone":"'sɑlɪd","phrases":"solid foundation: 基础雄厚；实体基础
solid waste: 固体废物，固态废物；固体废料，固体垃圾
solid state: 固态
solid phase: [物]固相
solid wood: 实木；紧密材
solid content: 固体含量；固形物
solid material: 固体材料，固体物料
solid solution: 固溶体
solid surface: 固体表面；实体曲面
high solid: 高固体份
solid particle: 固体微粒；实体颗粒
solid fuel: [化]固体燃料
solid support: 载体
solid food: 固体食物；干粮
solid work: 开切工作
solid ground: 坚实地；固定接地
solid fermentation: 固体发酵
suspended solid: 悬浮固体
solid wall: 实体墙；实心墙；实体岸壁
solid structure: 立体结构
","sentences":"The lake was frozen solid .
^^湖水冻得结结实实。^^
It was good to be back on solid ground again.
^^又能踏上坚实的土地感觉真好。^^
Is the baby eating solid food (= bread, meat etc ) yet?
^^宝宝吃固体食物了吗？^^
The ship’s sonar can detect the presence of solid objects in the water.
^^船上的声呐能够探测出水中的固体物。^^
","relWords":"adj.
solidified: 凝固的；固化的，变硬的

adv.
solidly: 坚固地；坚硬地；团结一致地

n.
solidarity: 团结，团结一致
solidity: 坚硬，坚固；体积；固体性
solidifying: 固化；凝固

v.
solidified: 凝固，团结（solidify的过去式和过去分词形式）
solidifying: 使凝固（solidify的ing形式）；使团结；使充实

vi.
solidify: 团结；凝固

vt.
solidify: 团结；凝固

","synos":"adj.
[物]固体的；可靠的；[数]立体的；结实的；一致的：responsible, honest, united, consistent, reliable
n.
[物]固体；[数]立方体：cube
"},"$:/SAT_3/opulent_16":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/opulent_16","tags":"?","word":"opulent","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'ɔpjulənt","usphone":"'ɑpjələnt","remMethod":" opul (财富) + ent (…的) → 有财富的 → 富裕的","sentences":"Europe’s opulent elite
^^欧洲富裕的精英阶层^^
","relWords":"adv.
opulently: 富裕地，丰裕地

n.
opulence: 富裕；丰富

","synos":"adj.
丰富的；富裕的；大量的：abundant, massive, extensive, substantial, macro
"},"$:/SAT_3/narrative_17":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/narrative_17","tags":"?","word":"narrative","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'nærətiv","usphone":"'nærətɪv","remMethod":"来自narrate (v. 叙述)","phrases":"narrative poem: 叙事诗；叙述诗
narrative therapy: 叙事疗法
","sentences":"If this story must be written, we must have the courage to eliminate all adjectives that tend to excite wonder: they would achieve the opposite effect, of impoverishing the narrative.
^^如果必须要写这篇故事，我们必须要有勇气剔除易于激发我们想入非非的所有形容词：这些词会使叙述贫瘠无力，起到相反的效果。^^
","relWords":"n.
narrator: 叙述者；解说员
narration: 叙述，讲述；故事

vi.
narrate: 叙述；讲述

vt.
narrate: 叙述；给…作旁白

","synos":"n.
叙述；故事；讲述：relation, statement, story, telling, tale
adj.
叙事的，叙述的；叙事体的：related, descriptive
"},"$:/SAT_3/coincide_18":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/coincide_18","tags":"?","word":"coincide","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"ˌkəuin'said","usphone":",koɪn'saɪd","remMethod":" co (共同) + in + cide (切) → 共同切分 → 一致， 符合","phrases":"coincide with: 符合；与...相一致
happen to coincide: 不约而同；不谋而合
","sentences":"The interests of the US and those of the islanders may not coincide.
^^美国的利益和这些岛民的利益可能并不一致。^^
","relWords":"adj.
coincident: 一致的；符合的；同时发生的
coincidental: 巧合的；符合的；暗合的；一致的

adv.
coincidentally: 巧合地；一致地

n.
coincidence: 巧合；一致；同时发生

","synos":"vi.
一致，符合；同时发生：cotton, square, identify, accord
"},"$:/SAT_3/circular_19":{"title":"$:/SAT_3/circular_19","tags":"?","word":"circular","created":"20220616115621604","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_3/Word}}","ukphone":"'səːkjulə","usphone":"'sɝkjəlɚ","phrases":"circular arc: 圆弧
circular saw: 圆锯
circular motion: 圆周运动；圆运动
circular hole: 圆孔
circular cylinder: [数]圆柱体；圆筒
circular knitting: 圆编；圆筒形针织
circular section: 圆截面
circular interpolation: 环形内插法
circular tube: 圆管
circular ring: 圆环
circular knitting machine: 针织大圆机；圆形针织机；圆编织机
circular cone: 圆锥，圆锥体
circular dichroism: 圆二色性，圆形二色性；循环二色性
circular polarization: [光]圆偏振
circular gear: 圆形齿轮，圆柱齿轮
circular cross section: 圆形截面；圆截面
